ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We brought them Our Signs but they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And though We had given them Our signs they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We also gave them Our Signs, yet they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We showed them miracles but they ignored them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We gave them Our signs, and they remained averse to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We gave them Our signs, but they were averse to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave them Our communications, but they turned aside from them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We brought them. Our signs, and they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we gave them Our revelations, but they were averse to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave them Our signs, but they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We brought Our signs unto them, yet they were averting themselves therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We had given them Our signs but they disregarded them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We sent them Our Signs, but they persisted in turning away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We gave them Our Signs, but they were averse to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We brought them signs, but they turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave them Our revelations, but they turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:81] And We brought them Our signs, by way of the she-camel [of Sālih], but they were averse [to them], refusing to reflect on them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And We gave them Our revelations) the camel as well as other things, (but they were averse to them) they denied them.
